gui.batches

Interface ITransferItemBatchView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferItemBatchView

    public interface ITransferItemBatchView
extends IView
    View interface for transfer item batch view.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the transfer item batch view.
      void enableItemAction(boolean value)
      Sets the enable/disable state of the "Transfer Item" button.
      void enableRedo(boolean value)
      Sets the enable/disable state of the "Redo" button.
      void enableUndo(boolean value)
      Sets the enable/disable state of the "Undo" button.
      java.lang.String getBarcode()
      Returns the value of the "Item Barcode" field.
      ItemData getSelectedItem()
      Returns the currently selected item in the "Items" table, or null if no item is selected.
      ProductData getSelectedProduct()
      Returns the currently selected product in the "Products" table, or null if no product is selected.
      boolean getUseScanner()
      Returns the "Use Barcode Scanner" setting.
      void giveBarcodeFocus()
      Gives the keyboard focus to the "Item Barcode" field.
      void selectItem(ItemData item)
      Selects the specified item in the "Items" table, or selects nothing if item is null.
      void selectProduct(ProductData product)
      Selects the specified product in the "Products" table, or selects nothing if product is null.
      void setBarcode(java.lang.String barcode)
      Sets the value of the "Item Barcode" field.
      void setItems(ItemData[] items)
      Sets the items displayed in the "Items" table.
      void setProducts(ProductData[] products)
      Sets the products displayed in the "Products" table.
      void setUseScanner(boolean value)
      Sets the value of the "Use Barcode Scanner" setting.

      • Methods inherited from interface gui.common.IView

        displayErrorMessage, displayInformationMessage, displayWarningMessage

      • selectItem

        void selectItem(ItemData item)
        Selects the specified item in the "Items" table, or selects nothing if item is null.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be selected. This must be one of the items previously passed to setItems, or null.

      • selectProduct

        void selectProduct(ProductData product)
        Selects the specified product in the "Products" table, or selects nothing if product is null.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be selected. This must be one of the products previously passed to setProducts, or null.

      • setBarcode

        void setBarcode(java.lang.String barcode)
        Sets the value of the "Item Barcode" field.
        Parameters:
        barcode - New "Item Barcode" value

      • setItems

        void setItems(ItemData[] items)
        Sets the items displayed in the "Items" table.
        Parameters:
        items - Array of items to display

      • setProducts

        void setProducts(ProductData[] products)
        Sets the products displayed in the "Products" table.
        Parameters:
        products - Array of products to display

      • setUseScanner

        void setUseScanner(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the "Use Barcode Scanner" setting.
        Parameters:
        value - New "Use Barcode Scanner" value
